answers.answer: Sure, why not.  LID messed up Christmas, might as well take out New Years too.  :-(Hang in there - this is so maddening, I know!!!  Did they test your TSH??I really hope that you hear soon, I know the last few days of the LID was like the last few weeks of pregnancy - you just want to scream GET THIS OVER WITH!  :-)  Although I have to admit, RAI and LID was much easier than childbirth (and raising them).I'm keeping my finger's crossed for you!  If all else fails, can you pull the old trick I used to?  Do you know any O-6 or above officers who could make a call to tricare on your behalf??  Amazing how well that works.  :-)Hang in there - we're here for you.

Venora,UUUUUGGGGHHHHH!!!!  The waiting is the worst and on top of it you have to be on that awful diet.I have had my dealing with Tricare....my mother-n-law was in a nursing home after a stroke almost three years ago and I am still waiting for them to pay...Anyway,  my thoughts and prayers are with you.  I hope it happens soon so you can have some normal food.Cheyne
Any luck with Tricare??P.S. - I love OC-ALC!  I worked at Hill AFB for years and OakCity was one of our sister logistics sites!!  Small world.

Thanks yall.I will keep you aprised of status.I wish I did know an officer to move things along.I am going to tricare office this am.there is a lady there who is pretty good about moving with the spirit.hehe.Acually the folks at the tricare office here in Oklahoma City are pretty good.So anyway heres to RAI.soon.Love Venora

I suspected you were connnected to Hill AFB lol especially after I saw a post when you metioned tricareI saw them yesterday am .They are going to push for a fast referral.The ladies in Tricare office here are great.It seems like humana took over tricare it started to go bad.Up till now I have pretty happy with the tricare.How is your search for insurance going?I have worried about that for you.Love Venora

I'm glad that the ladies in Tricare are getting you taken care of.  That's half the battle, getting to see someone face-to-face to help you.  Humana ran the HMO that I was under for my first delivery.  It was a horrible experience.  I hope that they have improved in the last 20 years! At least you won't have to deal with the idiot OB/GYN and pediatrician they had here - they don't treat thyroids!!  :-)I was able to get on an insurance plan that Utah has for uninsurable people (like cancer, diabetes, etc.).  I will have coverage but I have to figure out how to get my kids covered without going bankrupt.The fun never ends!Keep me posted and wave at the gate guard for me - I miss working on an Air Force base!

question: Hey yall I just got back from the endo.lovely  tricare Insurance has not sent approval yet for my RAI and scan.So the saga continues.Hurry up and wait.Its not the end of the world but I can see it from here.lolWhats a few more days on LID and being hypo right?Love Venora
title: Awaiting RAI day
